snippet.title: IFA 2013
snippet.description: Grab your tech passport and travel with us to Berlin for the massive 2013 IFA consumer-electronics t

snippet.title: Best headphones
snippet.description: Here we've picked our five favorites across every style and category, but if you already know which

snippet.title: Divoom Voombox Travel (black)
snippet.description: Despite some small flaws, the sturdily built Divoom Voombox Travel is a good budget choice for a wireless travel speaker.

snippet.title: Obama: Tech a 'tool for individual empowerment, not government control'
snippet.description: In his speech on recommended changes to the NSA, the president's rhetoric is in the right place. But are his efforts at reform?

snippet.title: DIY Travel Organizer
snippet.description: With just a handful of materials and only a few bucks, we show you how to make your own lightweight and compact travel organizer for all your tech accessories.

snippet.title: Have VinGardeValise, will travel
snippet.description: The VinGardeValise offers a sturdy solution for those that travel with wine. The wine suitcase has a foam interior and a polycarbonate shell, and it tracks its location.

snippet.title: Europe by Eurail is the best way to travel
snippet.description: Road Trip 2011: For CNET reporter Daniel Terdiman, taking trains all over Europe using a Eurail pass is both a reminder of great past travels and of the freedom and flexibility that the passes give those who carry them.

snippet.title: Top travel apps for iOS
snippet.description: There are plenty of apps in the App Store you can use to book flights, but this collection of apps is designed to make your travel days and vacation both easier and more memorable.

snippet.title: Map-free travel with the Navigate Jacket
snippet.description: Pedestrian accidents are on the rise as people are looking at their smartphones as they walk around. Now, a high-tech jacket has been developed to help people keep their heads up so they don't have to look at maps as they walk around. As CNET's Sumi Das shows us, the jacket has sensors that vibrate and light up to guide you.

snippet.title: Soen Transit: A slick Bluetooth travel speaker
snippet.description: While it's a bit pricey at around $200, the Transit by Soen is one of the better designed wireless speakers for on-the-go use.
